properties.Descriptio: The canal starts from the Gaswatta and flows across the Gaswatta reservation
properties.Observatio: During the rainy season when too much water flows, Bank erosion occurs
properties.Descript_1:
Canal protection including Earth work and  tree planting

Stream / canal  reservation protection by earth filling of  strip   of 1.5m to 2m wide  and average Depth of 0.5m

Vegetative cover improving for narrow strips (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Arecanut seedl

properties.Descriptio: Meeyan Arawa anicut and the canal
properties.Observatio: Existing Earthen canal,     Water from this canal is used to grow  Vegetable and paddy on an area of about 10 acres. In some places a canal breaks and water is obtained 225mm through pipes.
properties.Descript_1:
Canal concrete lining 

Canal reservation protection by concrete lining  For  100 mm thick , 300 mm  wide  and 300 mm high canal -double banking

Transporting of earth moving machinery

Miscellaneous

Contingencies 10%

properties.Observatio: Existing Earthen canal,     Water from this canal is used to grow  Vegetable and paddy on an area of about 20 acres. In some places  canal breaks and water is obtained  through 225mm pipes.
properties.Descript_1:
Construction of  30 m long Trough (with 0.30m x 0.30m section), 14 nos of piers (3.5 m total hight)

Site preparation & setting out

Earth excavation for foundation or quarry materials and haul the surplus materials up to 30m by Manually.
